Description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil on a thin crust.
A crowd-pleaser with generous layers of spicy pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.
Tangy BBQ sauce base, grilled chicken strips, red onions, and cilantro.
Loaded with bell peppers, onions, olives, mushrooms, and mozzarella cheese.
A tropical delight featuring ham, pineapple chunks, and a cheesy base.
Freshly squeezed lemon juice, sweetened to perfection. Served chilled.
A rich blend of espresso, chocolate syrup, and cold milk, topped with whipped cream.
A healthy mix of spinach, banana, mango, and almond milk.
Traditional Indian yogurt-based drink blended with sweet mango pulp.
Chilled carbonated mineral water with a slice of lime.
Triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.
Toasted panini with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil pesto, and balsamic glaze.
Thinly sliced steak, melted provolone cheese, and grilled onions in a hoagie roll.
Vietnamese-style sandwich with marinated spicy tofu, pickled carrots, and cilantro.
Classic sandwich with tuna salad and melted cheddar cheese on toasted rye bread.

A hearty hotdog smothered in beef chili and topped with melted cheddar cheese.
Plant-based sausage in a whole wheat bun with your choice of toppings.

A hearty and nutritious soup made with red lentils, carrots, celery, and spices.
A colorful bowl of roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, avocado, and mixed greens.
